style.content: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background-color: #f4f4f4; color: #333; } header { background-color: #9798af; color: #ffffff; text-align: center; padding: 1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } header::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff9a9e, #fad0c4); opacity: 0.3; z-index: 1; } header h1, header p { position: relative; z-index: 2; } .container { width: 80%; margin: auto; overflow: hidden; padding: 20px; } section { background-color: #ffffff; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 20px; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease; } section:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); } h1, h2 { color: #35424a; } .profile-img { width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%; display: block; margin: 20px auto; object-fit: cover; border: 5px solid #35424a; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .profile-img:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .achievement { margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #f9f9f9; border-left: 4px solid #35424a; } footer { background-color: #35424a; color: #ffffff; text-align: center; padding: 1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } footer::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff9a9e, #fad0c4); opacity: 0.3; z-index: 1; } footer p { position: relative; z-index: 2; } .skill-tag { display: inline-block; background-color: #35424a; color: white; padding: 5px 10px; margin: 5px; border-radius: 15px; font-size: 0.9em; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .skill-tag:hover { background-color: #ff9a9e; } .contact-info { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; flex-wrap: wrap; } .contact-item { margin: 10px; padding: 10px; background-color: #f9f9f9; border-radius: 5px; text-align: center; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .contact-item:hover { background-color: #fad0c4; } .hidden { display: none; }

content.p: Hello! I'm Shivalee Shukla, a dedicated IT Recruiter currently working at Golden Technologies. With a passion for connecting top tech talent with innovative companies, I bring expertise in talent acquisition, industry trends, and building strong professional relationships. My goal is to create perfect matches between skilled professionals and exciting career opportunities in the IT sector.

ul: Manage full-cycle recruitment process for IT roles across various technology stacks
Collaborate with hiring managers to understand technical requirements and cultural fit
Develop and implement innovative sourcing strategies to attract top tech talent
Conduct initial screenings and coordinate technical interviews
Maintain a robust pipeline of qualified candidates for current and future openings

achievements.p: Led a successful recruitment drive that resulted in hiring 50+ IT professionals within a quarter, reducing time-to-fill by 30%.
Spearheaded a diversity recruitment initiative that increased the representation of underrepresented groups in tech roles by 25%.
Collaborated with marketing to enhance employer branding, resulting in a 40% increase in inbound applications for tech positions.

footer.p: Â© 2024 Shivalee Shukla. All rights reserved.

script.content: const skills = ['Technical Recruiting', 'Talent Sourcing', 'Headhunting', 'Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)', 'Interview Techniques', 'Employer Branding', 'Salary Negotiations', 'LinkedIn Recruiting', 'IT Market Knowledge', 'Candidate Relationship Management', 'Diversity and Inclusion in Hiring']; function addSkillTags() { const skillTags = document.getElementById('skillTags'); skills.forEach(skill => { const tag = document.createElement('span'); tag.className = 'skill-tag'; tag.textContent = skill; skillTags.appendChild(tag); }); } window.onload = addSkillTags; const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section'); sections.forEach(section => { section.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => { section.style.backgroundColor = '#f9f9f9'; }); section.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { section.style.backgroundColor = '#ffffff'; }); }); const contactItems = document.querySelectorAll('.contact-item'); contactItems.forEach(item => { item.addEventListener('click', () => { const text = item.querySelector('p').textContent; navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(() => { alert('Copied to clipboard: ' + text); }); }); });
